lines: WARNING - THIS EPISODE CONTAINS SUBJECT MATTER OF A SEXUAL NATURE.

Until now, your sexual experiences with your wife have been the standard fare. You've done a little experimenting with positions but that's about it. Have you been thinking about suggesting something a little more out of the ordinary?
What would you like to try?
#SUGGESTING A MENAGE A' TROIS (SEX WITH YOUR WIFE AND ANOTHER WOMAN AT THE SAME TIME)
Your wife agrees that it would be fun
and goes along with the experience. The two of you have a great time. You find that this can be a powerful way of satisfying her sexual needs.

but doesn't go along with it. Your Expressiveness characteristic is not developed enough for you to explain what you would like to try in a way that gets her sufficiently aroused to want to do anything.
Your wife is too inhibited to do this, she tells you she would rather not.
